FulfillmentPlan.name: FulfillmentPlan
FulfillmentPlan.description: Represents a set of steps to be created to fulfill the order.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the fulfillment plan.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the record.

Priority.description: The priority of the fulfillment plan execution. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

SourceType.description: The type of source for the fulfillment plan. This field is available in API version 62.0 and later.

State.description: The status of the fulfillment plan.

UsageType.description: The business that uses Fulfillment Orchestration.
